CustomField.description: This field is used as the federation identifier for users requiring SSO logging into LBP community. This is required in scenarios where the user has an additional user account that uses SSO in either CRM core or another community. Note this workaround is required specifically since a some users will use SSO for login to MyNetwork and/or CRM core but still require SSO for LBP community with a different user record.
